clinical_history: Thyroid swelling and suspected nodular disease.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Uterus appears unremarkable; endometrial thickness measures 21.46 mm.
Prostate is hypoechoic; volume approximately 30.86 cc.
Soft tissue region demonstrates well-defined without fluid collection.
Testes are coarse with normal vascularity.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 21.0 bpm.
Placenta is hypoechoic and normally located.
